DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History Condition Year of Onset Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The year when the illness or circumstance which required medical monitoring began.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History Medical Condition Year of Onset
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._Any kind of illness or circumstance which requires medical monitoring._The year in which an event began.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any kind of illness or circumstance which requires medical monitoring.:The year in which an event began.

Concepts.definition: Any kind of illness or circumstance which requires medical monitoring.
The year in which an event began.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/10/19 jk Released per CPTAC SME (Linda) for Medical History CRF.  6-17-19 CPTAC Med History form; tt.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
